|brand = ALFA Network |model = AWUS036NHV |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 23, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ALFA_Network_AWUS036NHV |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = 2AB8F36V, 2AB878188 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188EUS; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 150 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''[[ALFA]]''''s drivers indicate this is a [[Realtek]] based device.
As of December 2014, the common driver for this device ''does not support monitor mode'' on Linux.
==Links of Interest== ===Forum posts=== *[http://foro.seguridadwireless.net/adaptadores-wireless-usb/alfa-network-awus036nhv-con-chipset-rtl8188eus/ Presumed legit images @ '''foro.seguridadwireless.net'''] :FCC ID: 2AB8F36V, "AWUS036NHV V011" and a date code of '''1416''' is silkscreened on the board shown. :The 2AB8F grantee code belongs to [http://szqunsuo.com/ '''Shenzhen Qunsuo Technology'''], a company which seems to manufacture thermal printers. :The FCC ID '''2AB8F36V''' doesn't seem to appear in the FCC database, however, FCC ID '''2AB878188''' does.. and it is listed as belonging to the AWUS036NHV. *[http://forum.antichat.ru/threadedpost3732360.html Presumed legit images of the 036NHV's board @ '''forum.antichat.ru'''] :"AWUS036NHV V011" and a date code of '''1416''' is silkscreened on the board shown.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
